description: Returns information about a Dev Environment for a source repository in a project. Dev Environments are specific to the user who creates them.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment for which you want to view information. To retrieve a list of Dev Environment IDs, use  ListDevEnvironments.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the Dev Environment was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: creatorId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the user who created the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: repositories
nested_items.description: The source repository that contains the branch cloned into the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the source repository.

nested_items.name: branchName
nested_items.description: The name of the branch in a source repository cloned into the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The user-specified alias for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: ides
nested_items.description: Information about the integrated development environment (IDE) configured for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: runtime
nested_items.description: A link to the IDE runtime image.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instace type to use for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: inactivityTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of time the Dev Environment will run without any activity detected before stopping, in minutes.

nested_items.name: persistentStorage
nested_items.description: Information about the amount of storage allocated to the Dev Environment. By default, a Dev Environment is configured to have 16GB of persistent storage.

nested_items.name: sizeInGiB
nested_items.description: The size of the persistent storage in gigabytes (specifically GiB).

nested_items.name: vpcConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection used to connect to Amazon VPC used when the Dev Environment was created, if any.
